name: clauses properties methods
description: finds clauses, properties, methods used in AppleScript strings
content:
-- '!' • __Choose Folders For Empty Ones (102 lijnen) • [contrived, scripted, modified by Marcus Bogaert ©2015, twistitideas] (15-05-20 om 23:56 uur) pad: "McMain:Users:marcusbogaert:Dropbox:__Choose Folders For Empty Ones.scptd"
\b(on |end )(?!\t)(?!(tell|error|if|run|try|script|repeat|timeout|of ))([a-zA-Z0-9]+|[\)\:\(]+).*|(property [\w]+.*)|(use [\w]+.*)

use AppleScript
use scripting additions
use application "ASObjC Runner"
use script "Inserter Utilities"
use ImagesHV : script "ImagesHV"
use CopyRTF : script "ASOCFileCopyRTF"
use PathConverter : script "PathConverter"

property findNameStub : "([a-z,A-Z,0-9\\-\\_]+)[\\/]?(?=\\/?$)"
property findBareName : "([^\\:|\\/]+)[\\w+]+(?=\\_\\d{6}\\/$)"
property btns : {"Sluit", "Selecteer map..."} --{"Nee", "Ja"}
property todayDWNFolder : "POSIX path of (((path to downloads folder) as text) & do shell script \"date \\\"+%F:\\\"\") as text"
property dateDWNMain : "date +%F"
property dateDWNPrefix : "do shell script \"date +%y%m%d\""
property bareNames : missing value
property foldersRecord : missing value
property dirList : missing value
property safFrontTabs : "tell application \"Safari\" to tell (windows whose name is in name of documents) to tell tabs to {index,name=\"Naamloos\", do JavaScript \"document.title\", (\"\"  & do JavaScript \"document.location.href\"), do JavaScript \"document.location.pathname\", its source}"
property argNM : "Links containing "
property recLabels : {"WindowCount", "WindowTabsCount", "TabIndexes", "TabTexts", "TabNames", "TabPosix", "TabPathItems", "TabTexts"}
property lookForStuff : "(http[s]?|\\?[s]?[=]?|www|com|php|\\?|\\=|\\#|[0-9]|(PinkFineArt)|( from )|(galleries)|(MacScripter)|(\\()|(\\))|(\\&)|(@)|(-)|(:)|(\\|)|(\\.)|(\\_)|(«)|(»)|(>)|(<)|(-)|(,)|(/)|(•)|( com )|( net )|( org )|(porn )|( url )|(imagefap)|( by )|( with )|(PRIVI[.]?NET)|\\+)"
property folInfos : {"«pnam»", "«ptsz»", "«posx»"} --{"«kind»", "«cÂp7»", "«pkgf»", "«sgrp»", "«cdis»", "«asda»", "«aslk»", "«cÂpe»", "«cÂp3»", "«phys»", "«sown»", "«cÂpc»", "«posx»", "«dnam»", "«cÂp8»", "«pnam»", "«cÂpa»", "«cÂp6»", "«utid»", "«pspd»", "«labi»", "«ascd»", "«pvis»", "«ctnr»", "«cÂpd»", "«asmo»",, "«ptsz»", "«cÂpb»", "«cÂp9»"}
property parsedLabels : {"«cÂpc»", "«eÂp2»", "«eÂp1»", "«cÂp1»", "«nmxt»"} --{nameStub, pathComponents, nameStubPath, containingItem,nameExt}

global listOfDirs, todayFolder, datePrefix, mainDate, listsOfNames, stateDir, emptyDirs

set emptyDirs to {}
set h to {}
set flds to ((choose folder multiple selections allowed 1) as list)

on parsePath:thisPath grabbingItems:theLabels
	tell (parsed path of (thisPath as text)) to copy it to parsedRec
	set nameStub to (value for label "«cÂpc»" in records pars
